titles.title: To amend the Expedited Funds Availability Act to require funds deposited by check from the Federal Government to be made available immediately.
To amend the Expedited Funds Availability Act to require funds deposited by check from the Federal Government to be made available immediately.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires a depository institution to make funds from a government check available immediately for withdrawal. Currently, these funds must be made available the next business day after deposit.
